alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 4:33PM AKST until December 27 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation of freezing drizzle, freezing rain, sleet, and snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...The Northeast Gulf Coast including Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Smooth, bare surfaces especially, may obtain a light glaze that could be very treacherous for pedestrians and vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle has already begun in Yakutat Sunday afternoon. Drizzle and rain could transition to snow this evening but then transition back to freezing rain or drizzle late tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
